about_the_game:
Surflexers is a fast-paced VR game with puzzle elements where you have to make quick decisions and move along "lines" to advance in the game. Be careful some "lines" are lead to a dead end.

Key Features:

Avoid white cross boxes
Do not fall
Collect coins
Ride along lines!
Be quick!
detailed_description:
Surflexers is a fast-paced VR game with puzzle elements where you have to make quick decisions and move along "lines" to advance in the game. Be careful some "lines" are lead to a dead end.

Key Features:

Avoid white cross boxes
Do not fall
Collect coins
Ride along lines!
Be quick!
name: Surflexers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
